Text:
thanks for the collection, I wonder if there are all the songs, but hey, I got the two beautiful ones I needed : 
letters from the sky
shelter

Thanks!!
Many many thanks!!  Just watched the movie! Loads of good songs!

Thank You Very Much XX
A10

Thanks so much locobot!!!
I was so bummed when i found out they didn't release an official soundtrack....because this grouping of songs is AMAZINGGGG!!!
The score they released made me go WTF! lol
I mean the songs are nice and all, but none were in the freaking movie........,.THESE are the songs everyone wants.....so yeah, thanks for putting them together!!!

and yes @bikerabhinav, these are all the songs used in the movie!! :D

Omg, i had to come back here and say how AMAZINGLY FANTASTIC the quality is here!!!
Like, 15/10!! 
It's CRYSTAL clear, loud, & crisp!!!! Thank you again - SO MUCH!!!

Civil Twilight's "Letters From The Sky" is one of those songs that gets under your skin - no matter your age.  While "I Am Number Four" is thought of primarily as a teen movie, don't you dare believe it.  The movie's soundtrack (moreso the unofficial version) seriously belies that.  I'm about to hit the big five-oh - and "Letters" hit me like a sucker-punch to the gut.  Be warned.

Oh i couldn't agree more.......WELL SAID! =)
